title: What's new in v2.58.0
content:
Features:
• Color remap
• Palette's color reduction
• RGBA and Indexed mode conversion

Enhancements:
• 'Selected' mode for layer configuration when exporting
• In-order and random multi-tile placement strategies for tilemaps
• Swipe navigation can work with vertical swipes to select layers
• Some tools, like color replace, outline, etc., can remember their last used parameters
• A toggle to make manual frame navigation ignore tags
• Timeline panel now auto-scrolls to the selected cel when opened
• Palette import from images now picks the most distinct colors
• Layer merge now ignores hidden layers
• Adjustable layer-only panel's width
• Adjustable gesture pad's opacity
• Adjustable slider tool size
• Added pixel-perfect toggle to keyboard shortcut
• New artwork panel remembers its last used parameters
• Auto show keyboard when entering text input
• Added numbers to image grid import

Fixes:
• Some keyboard shortcut issues
• 2x2 dithering presets don't include the max level
• Rare infinite loading at launch
• Some rare crashes/app freezes
